nodes.html:
• Team Leader in the Big Bang UK Young Scientists and Engineers Competition.
  • Used C/C++ and CAD to create a configurable automated test rig for a BorgWarner motor controller to increase the efficiency and affordability of production line quality inspection.
  • Second place in National Senior Engineering category, Alan Dixon prize, Gold CREST award.
• Integrated Design Project: Including manufacturing techniques, component design, Microcontroller and circuit design, C/C++ and component control, Presentation.
• Prize winner for the design challenge for an Aircon alternative, my design used the Peltier effect for wearable thermoelectric cooling clothes.

• C++/Python project to produce a dynamic simulation that used Euler/Verlet numeric integration to model principle forces from the equations of motion and control theory for an automatic landing procedure.
